summary: Comprehensive review identified 42 findings across 14 phases, with 8 blockers, 15 major issues, and 19 minor improvements. Key gaps in API specifications, schema definitions, and cross-tool synchronization.

findings.title: Missing API specifications
findings.description: Operating playbook lists services (Crossref, OpenAlex, etc.) but lacks concrete API endpoints, authentication methods, rate limits, pagination strategies, and error handling. This makes implementation impossible without significant research.
evidence: Lines 129-136: Lists services but no endpoints
findings.suggested_patch: Add explicit API reference table with: base_url, auth_method, rate_limit, pagination_type, retry_strategy, timeout_ms

findings.title: Temporal affiliation handling
findings.description: Join map doesn't specify how to handle researchers/employees who change affiliations over time. This affects collaboration network accuracy and could misattribute research outputs.
findings.suggested_patch: Add temporal_validity fields: {valid_from, valid_to, primary_flag} to person-org joins

findings.title: HS/CN mapping underspecified
findings.description: Supply chain mapping uses 'hints' for HS/CN codes but needs concrete mapping tables. Without standardized component→trade code mappings, supply chain analysis will be inconsistent.
findings.suggested_patch: Create hs_cn_mapping.json with {component_type, hs_codes[], cn_codes[], confidence, source}

findings.title: Graph metrics guards undefined
findings.description: Collaboration network metrics need 'guards' for disconnected graphs but thresholds and handling strategies are unspecified.
findings.suggested_patch: If components < 0.1 * node_count: warn; if largest_component < 0.5 * nodes: use component-wise metrics

findings.title: Hub promotion lacks transactions
findings.description: The promote_hubs workflow can partially fail, leaving hubs.conf in inconsistent state. No rollback mechanism for failed promotions.
findings.suggested_patch: Implement atomic write: copy hubs.conf → .tmp, modify, validate, then mv .tmp → hubs.conf

findings.title: Translation quality unscored
findings.description: Policy anchor crosswalk requires Chinese text but doesn't specify translation quality metrics or validation methods.
evidence: Line 644: 'translation_notes' field but no quality score
Line 215: Chinese capture but no QA
findings.suggested_patch: Add translation_confidence: 0-1, method: human|machine|hybrid, validator: email

findings.title: Momentum suppression undefined
findings.description: Narrative momentum metrics need suppression rules to avoid noise but thresholds and conditions are unspecified.
evidence: Line 231: 'suppression rules to avoid noise' without specifics
findings.suggested_patch: Suppress if: daily_change < 0.02 OR volume < 10 mentions/day OR source_diversity < 3

findings.title: Missing artifact schemas
findings.description: 15+ artifacts referenced without complete JSON schemas, making implementation ambiguous and validation impossible.
findings.suggested_patch: Generate JSONSchema for each artifact with required/optional fields, types, and constraints

findings.title: EU-specific residue
findings.description: 4 instances of EU-centric language/ordering remain in supposedly generalized templates.
findings.suggested_patch: Replace with neutral ordering; use {{REGION}} variables

findings.title: Date format inconsistency
findings.description: Three different date formats used across artifacts: YYYY-MM-DD, YYYY-MM, and implicit epoch timestamps.
evidence: Various JSON examples show different formats
findings.suggested_patch: Mandate ISO-8601: YYYY-MM-DD for dates, YYYY-MM for month-only, unix epoch for timestamps

findings.title: No preflight validation
findings.description: Phases can start without validating prerequisites, leading to cascading failures and wasted compute.
findings.suggested_patch: Add validate_inputs() before each phase; check artifact existence, schema compliance, ID coverage

findings.title: Narrative fact-check automation
findings.description: Narrative fact-checking could be more automated with explicit data source mappings.
evidence: Line 117: fact_check structure exists but manual
findings.suggested_patch: Add auto_metrics[] field mapping claims to specific data series

findings.title: Bindingness enumeration
findings.description: Policy bindingness field lacks enumerated values, leading to inconsistent categorization.
findings.suggested_patch: bindingness: enum[mandatory|recommended|voluntary|pilot]

findings.title: EU control equivalents
findings.description: NSPM-33 mentioned for US but no EU equivalent specified for funding controls.
evidence: Line 187: 'NSPM-33/EU hooks' but EU side vague
findings.suggested_patch: Add explicit: Horizon Europe Article 22, EU Regulation 2021/695

findings.title: Secondary affiliation type
findings.description: Secondary affiliation flag mentioned but not defined as boolean or enumeration.
findings.suggested_patch: affiliation_type: enum[primary|secondary|visiting|honorary|emeritus]

findings.title: VoI calculation method
findings.description: Value of Information hints mentioned but calculation method unspecified.
findings.suggested_patch: VoI = P(outcome_change) * Impact * (1 - Current_Certainty)

findings.title: War-game templates missing
findings.description: War-game injects mentioned but no scenario templates provided.
findings.suggested_patch: Add templates: tech_breakthrough, supply_shock, regulatory_change, partner_defection

findings.title: RACI format undefined
findings.description: RACI matrix mentioned but format not specified.
findings.suggested_patch: RACI as CSV: task,responsible,accountable,consulted,informed

findings.title: No partial failure recovery
findings.description: Matrix runs can partially fail with no cleanup or restart capability.
findings.suggested_patch: Add .INTERMEDIATE targets and make -k option; implement checkpoint/restart

findings.title: Cross-border placement ambiguity
findings.description: When countries disagree on cross-border hub inclusion, artifact placement is undefined.
findings.suggested_patch: Primary country = most nodes; conflicts → _xhub/disputed/
